LanguageData.DrakkenLaserDrill_UpdateByBuilding_Updat: Upgrade the Stored Energy of this Draken Laser Drill, with a maximum of 7 upgrade queues per Draken Laser Drill (Please ensure that there are no other things in the location where the upgrade construction is located)

Upgrade the Damage of this Draken Laser Drill, with a maximum of 7 upgrade queues per Draken Laser Drill (Please ensure that there are no other things in the location where the upgrade construction is located)

Upgrade the Armor Penetration of this Draken Laser Drill, with a maximum of 7 upgrade queues per Draken Laser Drill (Please ensure that there are no other things in the location where the upgrade construction is located)
